Title: Yami Shibai 2
Description: ["For the second time, the masked storyteller returns to tell children tales and legends of horror and woe, such as the tale of a ventriloquist's dummy, a locker that grants wishes, a capsule toy machine that returns lost possessions, and a strange food called Ominie-san.", ' ', ' ', ' ', ' Building on the foundation that was laid by the first, ', Yami Shibai 2, ' is a collection of Japanese scary stories of the unknown and the occult that are truly terrifying, narrated in a style of art that mimics kamishibai storytelling. ', ' ', ' ', ' ', ' [Written by MAL Rewrite]']
Staff: [['Iguchi, Noboru', 'Director'], ['Kumamoto, Hiromu', 'Script'], ['Hatsune, Miku', 'Theme Song Performance'], ['Yamakawa, Norio', 'Planning']]
